meanings.definition: The darkening of skin or other tissues due to the presence of melanin.
meanings.sent1: The doctor explained that melanization is a natural response to sun exposure.
meanings.sent2: His melanization increased after spending the summer at the beach.
meanings.sent3: She playfully teased her friend about his melanization after a day at the pool.
meanings.sent4: The melanization of the fruit indicated it was ripe and ready to eat.
meanings.sent5: The melanization of the sky during sunset painted a beautiful scene over the horizon.
